revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Iomega |model=HMEZ |revision=(3TB) |upc=742709355448 |asin=B007A2JNIQ |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=03/2012 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L8006EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;2;,,, Low Drop Adjustable Voltage Regulator;Unisonic;LD1117AG;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V Dual N&P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8958A;;1;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;ON Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ Low Power LDO RTC Regulator;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, Dual D-type Positive-edge-triggered Flip-flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.6.1 - EMC; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8; |oui_eth=00:D0:B8 }} {{TagLine|EZ Media & Backup Center}} :[https://download.lenovo.com/lenovoemc/na/en/app/cust_alp/p/1031%2c1150.html Product support]
"11014-1M", "48.63Y01.01M","HOMEMEDIA MB" :"MADE IN CHINA" are silkscreened on board bottom.
{{See also|Iomega|List of NAS Devices|List of Media Players}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.2GHz ARM v5 (Feroceon core) *Storage: 1MB NOR Flash, 3TB SATA Drive *Memory: 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Iomega EZ Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Iomega EZ Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
